tasks.title: Record C3 Compliance Demo Video
tasks.description: Start C3 app locally (docker-compose up in D:\VarnaAI\dashboard), record 5-10 min screen recording showing key features: GDPR scan, document generation, compliance dashboard. Use OBS or Windows Game Bar.

tasks.title: Record FwChange Demo Video
tasks.description: Start FwChange app locally (docker-compose up in D:\VarnaAI\fwchange), record 5-10 min screen recording showing: firewall change workflow, JIRA integration, multi-vendor support, compliance validation.

tasks.title: Record RetirementAI Demo Video
tasks.description: Start RetirementAI app locally (docker-compose up in D:\VarnaAI\pension), record 5-10 min screen recording showing: portfolio dashboard, AI advisor chat, Trading212 integration, retirement projections.

tasks.description: Create Calendly account (free tier), configure 30-min discovery call slots, add link to email signature and LinkedIn profile.

tasks.title: Research 50 Target Companies in Varna
tasks.description: Build target list of 50 qualified companies in Varna. Sources: VCCI directory, LinkedIn search, Bulgarian business registers. Focus: 10-500 employees, tech/finance/healthcare/manufacturing. Add to Google Sheets.

tasks.title: Find January Networking Events in Varna
tasks.description: Research and register for 1-2 networking events in Varna for late January. Check: VCCI events, tech meetups, business breakfast clubs. Target first event: Jan 26.

tasks.description: Contact Varna Chamber of Commerce & Industry about membership options. Benefits: networking events, business directory listing, credibility. See docs/strategy/C3/VCCI_Membership_Action_Plan.md

tasks.description: Final prep for first networking event (target: Jan 26). Checklist: 50 business cards ready, elevator pitch practiced, case study stories memorized, Calendly on phone, professional attire. See task_092.md for full prep guide.

tasks.title: Copy 8 marketing agents from varnaai-master
tasks.description: Implement the 8 marketing agents from varnaai-master using existing TypeScript implementations.
tasks.details: Use the existing `marketing-strategist.ts`, `content-creator.ts`, `seo-specialist.ts` and other agent implementations to create a new project with these agents.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit testing of each agent using Jest, integration testing with `varnaai-master` APIs

tasks.title: Add Prisma models to schema.prisma
tasks.description: Create new Prisma models for Campaign, SocialPost, ContentCalendar and other required entities.
tasks.details: Implement the `Campaign`, `SocialPost`, `ContentCalendar` and other models as described in the PRD.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end testing of database integration using Postman

tasks.title: Run database migration
tasks.description: Apply the new Prisma models to the existing database schema.
tasks.details: Use `prisma migrate` command to create the new tables in the database.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all data is correctly migrated using Postman

tasks.title: Create base API routes structure
tasks.description: Set up the basic API endpoints for the application.
tasks.details: Implement the `GET /api/marketing`, `POST /api/social` and other required endpoints using Next.js API routes.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement MailChimp connector
tasks.description: Integrate the MailChimp API with the application.
tasks.details: Use the `mailchimp` package to send campaigns and track engagement using the `MAILCHIMP_API_KEY` from the secrets file.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Buffer connector
tasks.description: Integrate the Buffer API with the application.
tasks.details: Use the `buffer` package to schedule social media posts and track engagement using the `BUFFER_ACCESS_TOKEN` from the secrets file.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement GA4 connector
tasks.description: Integrate the Google Analytics 4 API with the application.
tasks.details: Use the `ga4` package to track conversions and events using the `GA4_PROPERTY_ID` and `GA4_CREDENTIALS` from the secrets file.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement WordPress connector
tasks.description: Integrate the WordPress API with the application.
tasks.details: Use the `wordpress` package to publish blog posts and track engagement using the `WP_URL`, `WP_USERNAME`, and `WP_APP_PASSWORD` from the secrets file.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Meta connector
tasks.description: Integrate the Meta API with the application.
tasks.details: Use the `meta` package to track engagement and publish social media posts using the `META_ACCESS_TOKEN` from the secrets file.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement LinkedIn connector
tasks.description: Integrate the LinkedIn API with the application.
tasks.details: Use the `linkedin` package to track engagement and publish professional posts using the `LINKEDIN_ACCESS_TOKEN` from the secrets file.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Agent Orchestration
tasks.description: Create a workflow engine to control the execution of marketing agents.
tasks.details: Use a task queue (e.g. RabbitMQ) and inter-agent communication to implement the agent orchestration system.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end testing of the entire system using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Campaign Management
tasks.description: Create a campaign management interface for users to manage their campaigns.
tasks.details: Implement the `GET /campaigns`, `POST /campaigns` and other required endpoints using React
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Content Calendar
tasks.description: Create a content calendar interface for users to plan and schedule their content.
tasks.details: Implement the `GET /content`, `POST /content` and other required endpoints using React
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Social Media Scheduling
tasks.description: Create a social media scheduling interface for users to schedule their posts.
tasks.details: Implement the `GET /social`, `POST /social` and other required endpoints using React
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Email Campaigns
tasks.description: Create an email campaign interface for users to create and manage their campaigns.
tasks.details: Implement the `GET /email`, `POST /email` and other required endpoints using React
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Create an analytics dashboard for users to track their performance.
tasks.details: Implement the `GET /analytics` endpoint using React
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Error Handling and Loading States
tasks.description: Add error handling and loading states to the application.
tasks.details: Use try-catch blocks and async/await to implement error handling, and add loading states using React Hooks.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Polish and Documentation
tasks.description: Add polish and documentation to the application.
tasks.details: Use i18n to implement polish, and add documentation using JSDoc.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement End-to-End Testing
tasks.description: Create end-to-end tests for the application.
tasks.details: Use Postman to create test cases for each endpoint, and use Cypress to implement end-to-end testing.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing of each endpoint using Postman

tasks.title: Implement Campaign Auto-Pilot Mode
tasks.description: Create a campaign auto-pilot mode for users to automate their campaigns.
tasks.details: Use a task queue (e.g. RabbitMQ) and inter-agent communication to implement the campaign auto-pilot mode.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end testing of the entire system using Postman

tasks.title: Create VarnaAI Portfolio Page (EN & BG)
tasks.description: Create a single page showcasing all 8 apps, with design blocks added first by user and content filled in by Claude
tasks.details: This task involves creating the portfolio page layout using existing FwChange/C3 page patterns. The design will be added first by the user, followed by filling in content by Claude. The website URL for English portfolio is /portfolio/ and for Bulgarian portfolio is /bg/portfolio/. Ensure that all necessary dependencies from the base API routes structure (Task 42) are integrated into this task.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify correct implementation of the portfolio page, including integration with base API routes, functionality for user interaction, and proper display of content. Perform cross-browser testing to ensure compatibility with various devices and browsers.

tasks.title: Complete 8 Static Demo Subdomains on varnaai.com
tasks.description: Upload HTML files from D:/VarnaAI/Websites/online-demos/ via FTP after creating all static demo subdomains on varnaai.com
tasks.details: This task will be completed after Task #37: Create Static Demo Pages for All-Inkl and its prerequisites are finished. Ensure that the necessary subdomains (varnaai.com) have been created and are live, as stated in Task #37. Additionally, delete demo-c3.varnaai.com as mentioned in Task #6 (though this task does not have an ID provided). After verifying all 8 static demo subdomains are complete, use FTP to upload HTML files from D:/VarnaAI/Websites/online-demos/. The uploaded files should be used on the live subdomains.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all 8 static demo subdomains (varnaai.com) are accessible and rendering correctly. Use cURL or a similar tool to test each file's upload via FTP, ensuring it can be accessed from the web server without issues.
